<p id="description">Translazy is your go-to app for instant text translation. Whether youâ€™re traveling studying a new language or communicating across borders Translazy makes it simple and fast to bridge language gaps. With a few taps you can translate text between multiple languages making communication as smooth and lazy as it should be!</p>

  
  
<h2>ğŸ§ Features</h2>

Here're some of the project's best features:

*   Instant Translation: Translate any text in seconds with support for multiple languages.
*   Seamless User Experience: Clean and intuitive design focused on effortless translation.
*   Error Handling: Get clear messages when translation limits are reached or a network issue occurs.
*   Multi-Language Interface: The app adapts to your device language for a personalized experience.

  
  
<h2>ğŸ’» Built with</h2>

Technologies used in the project:

*   Flutter
*   Riverpod
